author: Pamela Muse
text:
A Colorado Alliance member is looking for information, consultant referrals, documentation, etc. re: fully integrating all databases together with a visual tool (AutoCAD?) showing the relationship between each system for non-IT types to understand the project.
Thank you in advance!
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Integration of all Databases
